text: Ikushima Ashishima Shrine is a shrine located in Shimonosato, Ueda City, Nagano Prefecture. It used to be a Myojin Taisha and is now a Beppyo shrine. == Related pages == * Ikukunitama Shrine ( Osaka City, Osaka Prefecture ) - Like Ikushima Ashishima-jinja Shrine, Ikushima-no-kami and Ashishima-no-kami are enshrined. Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Kokuhei Chūsha Category:Myōjin Taisha Category:Shinto shrines in Nagano Prefecture
title: Ikushimatarushima Shrine
